The sleeper hit of The Orange Box that took everyone by surprise.  Fantastic puzzles and humorous dialogue make this a great experience that only takes a few hours to get through.  Well worth your time and money.
A great casual puzzle game. Perfect for you if you're new to PC games.
非常にsmartなパズルゲーム。単純なパズルだけではなくて進めば進むほどストーリーが表立ってくるので是非ともplayしてみたほうがいいでしょう。END rollも楽しめました。
Amazing game! Good physics. Puzzle game and you get cake if you finish them all!
It still blows my mind that people haven't played this.  SUCH an amazing game.
I generally hate first person games, but this game was one of the best 3 hour video game experiences I've had. must buy!

I found this game incredibly exciting, baffling, headache-inducing and absolutely AWESOME. The replay value is delicious!

Perhaps the finest first person puzzle game ever. Nothing to shoot but portals. No one to kill but the system. Pure perfection. Pure Addiction.
This is one of the best games ever released.
I love this game. It one of the few games the make you think and is fun to play.

Portal is one of the best examples of 3D puzzle-platformer games. Even though it is not the main part of the game, the plot is also interesting. I still enjoy listening to "Still Alive" song sometimes.

If you enjoy the game and the genre, you should definitely play Portal 2 and Portal Stories: Mel, as well.
A classic. Great story, innovative gameplay and puzzles.
Мне, конечно, игра понравилась, но я так и не нашел этот глупый торт.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

Truly an inspired game. In Portal the environment is your enemy and your weapon is the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device. With many puzzles that will get you thinking with portals, it is also bundled with a lot of witty dialogue. This game is definitely a must play. Why are you continuing to read this?! Get it NOW!
Brilliant. I love it.
Mir gefällt dieses Spiel wirklich gut, ich konnte aber diesen blöden Kuchen nicht finden. xD wer hat den den kuchen gefunden?

Dieses online mmorpg ist für world of warcraft spieler perfekt geeignet . es besitzt Klasse man schlüpft in die Rolle eines kleinen Frosches, der die ihm gegebene Welt zu erkunden versucht und lernt dabei viele neue Freunde kennen.

A great platformer with great mechanics. Ponder your effects on space and time as you seem to deify them all. Bend gravity to your will, punch solid matter's restrictive properties in the face (figuritively), and get you some cake! = D Your friends companion cube and test protocol guy await!

As well, the game is HILARIOUS! XD
CAEK
This game is so much fun I had fun.
The most creative game ever

This is a great game. I starts out as a simple puzzle game, but eventually a storyline develops. Great fun, great humor....what are you waiting for.  While Portal 2 does stand on it's own for the most part, you definitely want to invest in this game to get the full story.

A true milestone in gaming. It breaks the boundary between puzzle and platformer, forming a new genre. The way physics is applied is astonishing, a technological marvel. Just messing around with the portals, and seeing how the science fits together is something every gamer has to experience. Even though the story is a mere five hours in length, challenge maps give replayers an incentive to go back. But honestly, the price justifies the story alone. It may not be as deep as it's sequel's, but it introduces universally acclaimed characters and gameplay mechanics that have changed the way we think in games. Essential.
10/10
jedna z nejlepších her co tu najdete!!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

Portal was AMAZING. Despite all the internet memes regarding Portal, you can't help but feel GLaDOS is on your side until you start getting freaked out at some points. Anyways, Portal is just FANTASTIC.
This game is awesome
Short, but funny

Debes jugarlo.

Supongo que todo el mundo sabe que este juego en realidad empezó como un experimento de valve con su nuevo motor de físicas y que al ver su potencial decidió crear un juego con el que posiblemente sea el mejor/peor enemigo al que hayas podido enfrentarte nunca.

Resuelve las salas con puzzles mientras adquieres conociemientos sobre los portales y su uso, aprovecha las leyes de la física para poder llegar a sitios imposibles (sobretodo con la consevación de movimiento) y disfruta de una historia que pese a ser muy cortita te servirá como introducción a todo lo que ocurre en Portal 2 (evidentemente recomendadísimo).

Lo dicho, compra recomendada a la que puntúo con un 10/10

If you like puzzle-games, I recommend Portal.  It looks like a familiar 3D gaming environment (first person view) but instead of fighting things the objective is to bypass barriers and manipulate objects in order to proceed to the next area.
Definately the best way to spend procrastination time :)
I just want my companion cube to talk to me!  It gets so lonely in there
Eins der besten & innovativsten Spiele aller Zeiten! Mit genial-krankem Humor.
This game was a triumph.
An instant classic.

Первая часть Portal не знаю как на вас, а на меня оказала огромное впечатление. Я прошёл игру буквально на одном дыхании, безвылазно просидев перед компьютером часа три, ухохатываясь над сарказмом ГЛэДОС и напрягая извилины, что бы пройти очередную камеру испытаний. После последней сцены и финальных титров у меня по коже побежали мурашки...а торт-то есть! Моя оценка: 101 из 100 и я считаю её более чем заслуженной.

Superb game - one of the all-time greats and a classically awesome ending and ending song.  :)
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

[h1]TL;DR -- Short and quirky platforming game with a helpful computer AI[/h1]

There are teleporting portals to jump into, boxes to move, and various big red buttons to push. GLaDOS (the computer voice) is there to guide you through the various tests. And there is cake at the end!

Шедевр!!!
Такого необычного и интересного геймплея можно сказать нигде нет. Отдельно отмечу режим испытаний. Он очень крут и сложен, особенно на ограниченное количество шагов. Очень сложно пройти на золото, но советую всем это сделать. Это запомнится на долго. Даже просто их пройти, всё равно будет очень круто. Всем рекомендую!!!
